misc: Adopted a L.A.B. Golf zero torque putter for the 2025 season
biography: Simo, a formidable competitor hailing from Hirsala Golf, is a well-known figure in the Hector Trophée. With nine past appearances under his belt, Simo is set to make his tenth appearance in the upcoming Hector Trophée 2025.

Known for his powerful drives and strategic course management, Simo has secured the coveted Hector Trophée on three occasions, demonstrating his exceptional skill and unwavering determination. While the Victor Trophy has eluded him thus far, Simo's consistent performance and competitive spirit make him a perennial contender.

Off the course, Simo is known for his colorful language and intense focus. For the 2025 season, Simo has adopted a L.A.B. Golf zero torque putter, a change that he hopes will further elevate his game. Spectators can anticipate another spirited performance from Simo as he once again takes on the challenges of the Hector Trophée.
